title: Gorgeous Luxury Hill Country Homes!
posting_body: This beautiful community features 1 & 2 bedroom luxury apartments in the Bee Cave area.
Situated inside the Hill Country Galleria off Hwy 71,  this community offers different and unique homes with designer finishes and a soft color scheme choice.
Enjoy natural lighting in every apartment home and walk-in closets to help keep you organized.
All units come equipped with a washer & dryer, spacious patios, crown molding, and so much more!
Discover a finer style of living!
Super close to Wholefoods, Barnes & Noble, Amy's Ice Cream, Dillard's, Iron Cactus, and CineMark - just to name a few!
Internet WiFi access in all common areas
Resident business and conference center including computers, fax and copier
Walk to dining, shopping, banking and movies
Resident Business Center with two billiard tables and poker table
Stainless steel double sink with vegetable sprayer
Ceiling fans with light kits in bedroom and living room
Utility rooms with washer and dryer included
Multiple telephone and cable lines for high speed data
Spacious private patios with Hill Country views
Custom beveled corners on interior walls
You have to see this awesome community for yourself!
Call today to schedule your showing!
Matt Davidson ~over 28 years of leasing experience in Austin~
I have access to over 1000 listings, and can help you with all your renting needs!
FREE SERVICE TO YOU, NO FEES!
